item.title: SWN
item.description: score:-76 Chances: Higher oil production and reduction in marketing purchases aid Southwestern’s Q4 earnings. The longer-term bull case for natural gas rests on expanding U.S. exports. Risks: Significantly high institutional ownership implies Southwestern Energy’s stock price is sensitive to their actions. Front-month gas futures for March delivery on the New York Mercantile Exchange are subject to supply and demand fluctuations.
